name: CPManeuverDisplayStyle
desc: A display style that determines the visual layout for a maneuver.

items.name: static var leadingSymbol: CPManeuverDisplayStyle
items.desc: The symbol appears before the instructions for the maneuver.

items.name: static var trailingSymbol: CPManeuverDisplayStyle
items.desc: The symbol appears after the instructions for the maneuver.

items.name: static var instructionOnly: CPManeuverDisplayStyle
items.desc: Only the instructions appear for the maneuver.

items.name: static var symbolOnly: CPManeuverDisplayStyle
items.desc: Only the symbol appears for the maneuver.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a maneuver display style using the specified raw value.
